page.title: 14RECREATION AROUND GRAFTON
page.content: As this is a very rural area there is very little opportunity for recreation but we do have some facilities such as the football field in Welford where the local village team play. There is also a Cricket Club which plays at Grafton Court. A more peaceful sport, fishing, is done on the Avon at Welford and clubs come from Birmingham and Redditch to fish there. There are also boating facilities at Welford and a number of boats are moored up river from 'The Four Alls'. Many holiday barges go along the river in the summer. Temple Grafton and Binton both have Village Halls which are used by the Womens Institute and Snooker Clubs. Discos are also held there every now and then.
